snippet: Recent research has shown the extent of giving by female philanthropists, and how their giving differs from that of men.
abstract: Recent studies, which represent first systematic look at gender and philanthropy, reveal that women generally donate more, are more actively involved in the given charities, demand more proof of effectiveness and prefer somewhat different causes than men; as organizations adjust their marketing in light of these findings, it could mean more donations to social services and causes related to women, and more money over all.
lead_paragraph: Recent research has shown the extent of giving by female philanthropists, and how their giving differs from that of men.

headline.seo: Groups Work on Attracting Women Philanthropists
headline.main: In Pursuit of the Female Philanthropists
headline.print_headline: In Pursuit of the Female Philanthropists
